column1: highlight #:  1  In fiscal year 2003, States spend the most for corrections - 39.2 billion. Local governments spent the most for police functions – 57.5 billion. (Expenditure in millions)
series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment in the United States 2003, NCJ 212350
data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
Highlight 1. In fiscal year 2003, States spend the most for corrections - $39.2 billion. Local governments spent the most for police functions – $57.5 billion. (Expenditure in millions)
